title: We need tougher borders between plat and diamond
body:
Promos need to be longer and games need to be tougher in plat 1

Tons of unbalancy between high plat and diamond

People, people who are low diamond and people who have been in low diamond, have been telling me this, and I see this myself.

The plats are bringing in the feeding, the trolls, and the afkers 

They can come come to diamond, but they'll have to come in fairly
